    title: 'Stack',
    subtitle:
        'The Stack component serves as a layout element that evenly distributes child elements with consistent spacing.',
    description:
        'Stacked layouts are a widely used method for achieving consistent visual spacing on either the horizontal or vertical axis, without directly altering child elements.',
}

```tsx
import { Stack } from "@fold-ui/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => {
    return (<Stack spacing={20}>
            <Avatar name="Etienne Dreyer"/>
            <Avatar name="Aubrey Moagi"/>
            <Avatar name="Patrick Anthony"/>
            <Avatar name="Charlene Singh"/>
            <Avatar name="Craig Pather"/>
        </Stack>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => {
    return (
        <Stack spacing={20}>
            <Avatar name="Etienne Dreyer" />
            <Avatar name="Aubrey Moagi" />
            <Avatar name="Patrick Anthony" />
            <Avatar name="Charlene Singh" />
            <Avatar name="Craig Pather" />
        </Stack>
    )
}
```
### Vertical

export const Vertical = () => {
    return (<Stack spacing={20} direction="vertical">
            <Avatar name="Etienne Dreyer"/>
            <Avatar name="Aubrey Moagi"/>
            <Avatar name="Patrick Anthony"/>
            <Avatar name="Charlene Singh"/>
            <Avatar name="Craig Pather"/>
        </Stack>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Vertical />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Vertical.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Vertical = () => {
    return (
        <Stack
            spacing={20}
            direction="vertical">
            <Avatar name="Etienne Dreyer" />
            <Avatar name="Aubrey Moagi" />
            <Avatar name="Patrick Anthony" />
            <Avatar name="Charlene Singh" />
            <Avatar name="Craig Pather" />
        </Stack>
    )
}
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
